pullrequest.title: Fixed precompiled headers to work in more use-cases.

content.raw: I also moved `${ARGN}` out of the `separate_arguments` call, because this is a CMake-list, which gets convereted to a semicolon-separated string whenever it occurs inside double quotes. That resulted in all `${ARGN}` args being joined into one "UNIX argument" with backslash-escaped semicolons inside. I understand this faulty behaivor did not show up before, because there was at most one additional argument passed to `add_pch` in all the build files.
